actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide increased awards of service-connected compensation to certain blinded veterans who are suffering from additional disabilities.

summary.text: Authorizes benefits for service-connected disabilities involving loss of vision if the impairment is 20 percent or more disabling (currently 60 percent disabling). (Amends 38 U.S.C. 314)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide increased awards of service-connected compensation to certain blinded veterans who are suffering from additional disabilities.
